name: AVAudioConnectionPoint
desc: A representation of either a source or destination connection point in the audio engine.

items.name: func inputConnectionPoint(for: AVAudioNode, inputBus: AVAudioNodeBus) -> AVAudioConnectionPoint?
items.desc: Returns connection information about a node’s input bus.

items.name: func outputConnectionPoints(for: AVAudioNode, outputBus: AVAudioNodeBus) -> [AVAudioConnectionPoint]
items.desc: Returns connection information about a node’s output bus.

items.name: var bus: AVAudioNodeBus
items.desc: The bus on the node in the connection point.

items.name: var node: AVAudioNode?
items.desc: The node in the connection point.
